mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member (U_ID, U_PWD, U_NAME, U_ADR, U_ADRCODE, U_TEL, U_MAIL) VALUES (#{u_id}, #{u_pwd}, #{u_name}, #{u_adr}, #{u_adrcode}, #{u_tel}, #{u_mail})

INSERT INTO member (U_ID, U_PWD, U_NAME, U_ADR, U_ADRCODE, U_TEL, U_MAIL, JOINWAIT, S_FILE, R_CODE) VALUES (#{u_id}, #{u_pwd}, #{u_name}, #{u_adr}, #{u_adrcode}, #{u_tel}, #{u_mail}, 'Y', #{s_file}, #{r_code})
mapper.update: update member set S_PAY = S_PAY + #{i_pay} where u_id = #{u_id}
update member set mileage= mileage + 1000 where u_id= #{u_id}
update member set mileage= CASE WHEN mileage-1000 < 0 THEN 0 ELSE mileage-1000 END where u_id= #{u_id}
update member set mileage= mileage + #{mileageU} where u_id= #{u_id}
update member set mileage= mileage - #{mileageD} where u_id= #{u_id}
update member set JOINWAIT = 'N', S_REG = 'Y' where u_id= #{u_id}
mapper.select: select count(*) from member where JOINWAIT='Y'
select count(*) from member where S_REG='Y'
select count(*) from member where JOINWAIT='N' and S_REG='N'
select * from member where JOINWAIT='N' and S_REG='N'

select m.*, k.s_id, k.i_code, k.i_regdate, k.e_date, k.i_pay, k.i_name from member m join (select a.*, b.I_NAME from purchase a join service b on a.i_code = b.i_code where a.u_id = #{u_id}) k on m.u_id = #{u_id}
select a.*, b.s_id from member a join store b on a.u_id = b.u_id where a.u_id = #{u_id}
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER by REGDATE DESC) AS row_num ,a.* FROM member a ) WHERE row_num BETWEEN #{firstRecordIndex} AND #{lastRecordIndex}
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER by 1 DESC) AS row_num ,a.* FROM member a where JOINWAIT='Y' ) WHERE row_num BETWEEN #{firstRecordIndex} AND #{lastRecordIndex}
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER by 1 DESC) AS row_num ,a.* FROM member a where JOINWAIT='N' and S_REG='N' ) WHERE row_num BETWEEN #{firstRecordIndex} AND #{lastRecordIndex}
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER by 1 DESC) AS row_num ,a.* FROM member a where S_REG='Y' ) WHERE row_num BETWEEN #{firstRecordIndex} AND #{lastRecordIndex}
